description: Try our easy to follow Raisin Toast French Toast  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: French toast,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Peanut free
name: Raisin Toast French Toast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slices Mighty Soft Fruit Loaf Cafe Style

recipeInstructions.text: In a shallow, wide bowl whisk together eggs, milk and cinnamon.

Place a fry pan on medium-high heat. Dip both sides of a slice of Mighty Soft Fruit Loaf Cafe Style into the egg mixture and fry in tbsp of butter. Cook each side for 2 minutes or until golden around the edges. Repeat with remaining slices of raisin toast.
Top with sliced berries, maple syrup and a dusting of icing sugar â€“ serve while warm.
